tweet_text:
@Ridermeister @mrsouthernmaths Last year we did 4 assessments per year group (each on on any topic). I felt the amount was about right. We've moved to 6 this year which I am grumpy about.

If I had to mark as much work as you sound like you have to I'd go and work in Morrisons instead.
